description: This source file defines a frontend UI component named 'NoteEditor' for a note-taking application. It uses LightningJS framework for rendering UI elements, with properties, template, data, watch, methods, and lifecycle hooks to manage note editing functionality.

methods.name: _save
methods.description: Saves the updated note data via the dataProvider's update method, and updates the local note state on success.

methods.name: _setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title text in the UI and optionally saves the change.

methods.name: _setBody
methods.description: Sets the body text in the UI and optionally saves the change.
